title: Obstruct
short: Complete all levels without falling into the holes of your game window!
description: Obstruct is a little game made for an Itch.io game jam. The goal of the game is to finish all levels without falling into the window's holes.
This game isn't polished nor stable and it's not meant to be. It's just a little game I made in a few hours to try out Window's window masks system.
The game is available on Itch.io and on Github, if you want to try it out or check the source code!
